name: OpenSSL-Framework
description:
The OpenSSL Project is a collaborative effort to develop a robust, commercial-grade, full-featured, and Open Source
    toolkit implementing the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL v2/v3) and Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols as well as a
    full-strength general purpose cryptography library.

    This CocoaPod provides OpenSSL as an iOS framework. It uses the OpenSSL-for-iOS scripts from Felix Schulze to
    compile OpenSSL.
